input.description: Path to local or URL to remote OpenAPI 3 spec file in JSON or YAML format.

output.description: Path to directory where the generated files will be written to. Defaults to 'src/app/api'.

defaultTag.description: Tag name assumed for operations without tags. Defaults to 'Api'.

fetchTimeout.description: Timeout for fetching spec file from remote URL, in milliseconds. Defaults to 20000.

includeTags.description: Specific tags to be included. Overrides "excludeTags". Defaults to [].

excludeTags.description: Specific tags to be excluded. Defaults to [].

ignoreUnusedModels.description: Whether to skip models with no references to them. Defaults to true.

removeStaleFiles.description: Whether to remove redundant files in the output directory. Defaults to true.

modelIndex.description: TypeScript file name (without the ".ts" extension) that exports all models. Set "false" to skip. Defaults to 'models'.

serviceIndex.description: TypeScript file name (without the ".ts" extension) that exports all services. Set "false" to skip. Defaults to 'services'.

indexFile.description: Whether to generate an "index.ts" file that exports all generated files. Defaults to false.

servicePrefix.description: Prefix for generated service classes. Defaults to ''.

serviceSuffix.description: Suffix for generated service classes. Defaults to 'Service'.

modelPrefix.description: Prefix for generated model classes. Defaults to ''.

modelSuffix.description: Suffix for generated model classes. Defaults to ''.

module.description: Name for the module class that provides all services. Set "false" to skip. Defaults to 'ApiModule'.

configurationFile.description: Name for the configuration file to generate. Defaults to 'api-configuration'.

rootUrlToken.description: Name for the "root URL" DI token to generate. Defaults to 'API_ROOT_URL_TOKEN'.

requestBuilder.description: Name for the request builder class to generate. Defaults to 'RequestBuilder'.

response.description: Name for the response class to generate. Defaults to 'StrictHttpResponse'.

enumStyle.description: Determines how root enums will be generated. Defaults to 'pascal'.

templates.description: Path to directory with custom templates. All `.handlebars` files will override the corresponding default.

excludeParameters.description: When specified, filters the generated services, excluding any param corresponding to this list of params.

skipJsonSuffix.description: When specified, does not generate a $Json suffix. Defaults to false.

customizedResponseType.description: Defines responseType for specific paths to use. Commonly used when built-in deduction can't fulfill your needs.

responseMethodDescription.description:
Description template for generated $response method. Defaults to '{{descriptionPrefix}}This method provides access to the full `HttpResponse`, allowing access to response headers.
To access only the response body, use `{{methodName}}()` instead.{{descriptionSuffix}}'.
responseMethodDescription.default:
{{descriptionPrefix}}This method provides access to the full `HttpResponse`, allowing access to response headers.
To access only the response body, use `{{methodName}}()` instead.{{descriptionSuffix}}

bodyMethodDescription.description:
Description template for generated $body method. Defaults to '{{descriptionPrefix}}This method provides access only to the response body.
To access the full response (for headers, for example), use `{{responseMethodName}}()` instead.{{descriptionSuffix}}'.
bodyMethodDescription.default:
{{descriptionPrefix}}This method provides access only to the response body.
To access the full response (for headers, for example), use `{{responseMethodName}}()` instead.{{descriptionSuffix}}

fallbackPropertyType.description: Fallback property type when type can not be determined for any reason. Defaults to 'any'.
